introduction.para: You can display negative numbers by using the minus sign, parentheses, or by applying a red color (with or without parentheses).

listItem.para: Select the cell or range of cells that you want to format with a negative number style.

If you're using Windows, press Ctrl+1. If you're using a Mac, press
+1
In the Category box, click either Number or Currency.
Under Negative numbers, select an option for negative numbers.

introduction.para: Where's the parentheses option? If you're missing the parentheses option for negative numbers, it may be due to an operating system setting. This article explains how to fix this.
